answers.answer: Hello,Such crawling movement on tip of penis can be due to an allergic reaction (say to body lotions, condoms, soaps etc) or it can be a skin condition like eczema, dermatitis etc or it can be a fungal infection. Other than that it can be a simple bacterial infection or balanitis or parasthesia skin. If you are sexually active get a complete STD panel done. Otherwise get your blood sugar levels and vitamin B 12 levels also done as diabetes and vitamin B 12 deficiency can also cause such crawling sensations.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: I'm a 26yr old male and earlier this week out of nowhere i got this wierd feeling on the tip of my penis. at first it felt like and i thought something was crawling on it.  when i began to check it felt like something was attacking the tip.  (the pain was so bad i yelled till a sore throat.)  now from time to time i feel as if something is moving around mainly in the tip, sometimes along the shaft.  it doesnt hurt but if i dnt grab my penis wen i feel it, it begins to. is this kidney stones? i dont have any pain in my lower back, sides or elsewhere. only in the tip.
title: movement like feeling & severe pain
